title: Boris Johnson urges boosters as U.K. faces 'tidal wave' of omicron infections
content:
1. Boris Johnson urges boosters as U.K. faces 'tidal wave' of omicron infections  NBC News
  2. Watch in full: Boris Johnson announces new Covid booster targets  The Independent
  3. Covid: Boris Johnson sets new booster target over 'Omicron tidal wave'  BBC News
  4. Johnson vows faster booster jabs as he warns of ‘Omicron wave’  Al Jazeera English
  5. All adults to be offered Covid booster jabs before New Year, says Boris Johnson  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
